Method Detail

getAnimatedPartition

public abstract Partition getAnimatedPartition()
Gets a visible partition in the diagram of the instance. Supposed to be the last main partition, or its last child, or its last grand... A visible partition partition is recognized by having a bounds.

Returns:
null if no visible partition is found

threads

public static ToImages threads(Diagram diagram)
Creates an instance that creates thread diagrams.

Parameters:
diagram - the diagram to save as image(s)
Returns:
an instance

newImage

public java.awt.image.BufferedImage newImage(java.awt.Dimension size)
Creates an image of the diagram. Typical usage: ImageIO.write(java.awt.image.RenderedImage, java.lang.String, javax.imageio.stream.ImageOutputStream). The resulting image can be included in documents or web pages.

Parameters:
size - Dimensions of the created image. The image will not be resized or repositioned to fit.
Returns:
an image

createSlides

public void createSlides(java.awt.Dimension size,
                         java.lang.String file)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Writes a set of images. The created files could be used for an animated gif or slide show. The images show how to create the piece of lace stitch by stitch.

Parameters:
size - dimensions of the created images
file - name of the files to create. A sequence number is inserted before the dot of the extension. The extension defines the format.
Throws:
{@link - IllegalArgumentException} if the file name extension is not found in the result of formats()
{@link - IOException}
java.io.IOException
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

formats

public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> formats()
